properties.name: PROMPT_CONFIGURATION_PATH
properties.description: Path to a custom JSON file which contains the classes and associated prompts that will be sent to Pixtral.

properties.name: JSON_PROMPT_CONFIGURATION_PATH
properties.description: Path to a custom JSON file which contains classes and prompts that specify Gemini to return a JSON object.

actions.name: PIXTRAL CRYPTOCURRENCY DETECTION (JSON PROMPT) ACTION
actions.description: Runs Pixtral with JSON prompts for each image.

tasks.name: PIXTRAL CRYPTOCURRENCY DETECTION (JSON PROMPT) TASK
tasks.description: Runs Pixtral with JSON prompts for each image.

pipelines.name: PIXTRAL CRYPTOCURRENCY DETECTION (JSON PROMPT) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Runs Pixtral with JSON prompts for each image.
